root.name: UFC 2009 Undisputed
root.description: This game is Yuke's first attempt at a PS3/ Xbox 360 version of a UFC game. The game was developed by the same team that was involved with the extremely popular WWE wrestling games, and built a unique engine for this game for the ground up to try and deal with the complex moves that occur in MMA fights.Fighter InformationHEAVYWEIGHTSName Rating Height / Weight Reach Nickname Andrei Arlovski (Boxing / BJJ) 88 6' 4" / 235 lbs. 74" The Pitbull Mark Coleman (Boxing / Wrestling) 78 6'1" / 255 lbs. 75" The Hammer Mirko Filipovic (Kickboxing / Wrestling) 83 6' 2" / 220 lbs. 73" Cro Cop Gabriel Gonzaga (Muay Thai / BJJ) 85 6' 2" / 255 lbs. 76" Napao Antoni Hardonk (Kickboxing / Wrestling) 84 6' 4" / 245 lbs. 78" - UNLOCKABLE FIGHTERSMaskPunk AssSkyscrape * Fights in two divisions** Free Preorder Bonus DLC FighterTechnologyThe engine for UFC 2009 Undisputed has been built from the ground up.One of the core strengths of the engine is the ability to calculate velocity and mass. William Schmitt (THQ) recently stated that you can knock an opponent out within 10 seconds; based on factors like timing, angle, stance and weight distribution.Other notable aspects:The submission and tap sequences currently involve a two stage process, you have to complete both stages to achieve either outcome. There is no HUD except for round, round time and an optional stamina bar (which can be activated in the options menu), otherwise all damage and exhaustion are shown through the fighters appearance. Damage is not just superficial, if your fighter has a swollen eye the impaired vision will affect his striking from that side of the body.
